author: namngrg
content:
Hey <@774033563732541451> , 
Some time ago I talked you regarding this [Real world test](https://github.com/status-im/nim-eth-verkle/issues/7) - basically the motive is to battle test the implementation before the integration. 
Now we are close to the completion and its time to solve this! 
BTW to me this seemed like the bulk converstion method i.e. taking the key-values and inserting into the VKT and analyse it.
And since you also mentioned that Gballet is trying to make a test vector from Kaustinen that will help us verify. (I will also try to come up with the test vector).

Didnt have any question just wanted to share and if you have any views ðŸ™‚

author: jsign
content:
sounds good. to be clear, i mentioned guillaume had the idea of generating test vectors from kaustinen; he's currently focusing on other things on kaustinen.
i'll be using kaustinen for other kind of analysis and double-checking of many things; so i can also at some point help with this.
